thread.title_full: Join the 2025 Undergraduate Program (UM Pathway) at FIB Undip: It's Time to Study at a Faculty of Quality and Integrity!

author: Aulia Faradiva
title: Join the 2025 Undergraduate Program (UM Pathway) at FIB Undip: It's Time to Study at a Faculty of Quality and Integrity!
text:
Are you looking for a university that not only excels academically but also offers a warm, inclusive learning environment grounded in integrity? Don’t miss this golden opportunity to join the Faculty of Humanities, Universitas Diponegoro (FIB Undip) through the 2025 Undergraduate Program – Independent Selection Pathway (Jalur UM)!
With a strong reputation and years of experience as one of the leading faculties, FIB Undip is ready to guide you toward a bright and meaningful future.
A Selection of Relevant and Forward-Thinking Study Programs Through the 2025 UM Pathway, FIB Undip is opening registration for six popular undergraduate programs, each designed to equip you with practical knowledge that meets the demands of today’s world:
1. Bachelor’s in Indonesian Literature Perfect for those who love language and literature and are passionate about preserving Indonesian culture through writing and literary studies.
2. Bachelor’s in History Ideal for students who enjoy exploring the past to better understand the present and shape the future. History never goes out of style!
3. Bachelor’s in English Literature Unlock global opportunities by mastering an international language. Great for aspiring translators or professionals aiming for international careers.
4. Bachelor’s in Japanese Language and Culture Fascinated by Japanese culture? This program will immerse you in the Japanese language and provide deep cultural insights.
5. Bachelor’s in Library and Information Science In the digital era, information is everything. This program is perfect for those interested in data management, documentation, and information technology.
6. Bachelor’s in Social Anthropology Curious about human behavior and society? This program explores culture, tradition, and social dynamics up close.
2025 UM Pathway Registration Timeline Mark these important dates!
Online Registration: April 9 – June 12, 2025
Online Exam: June 16 – 26, 2025
Selection Results Announcement: July 8, 2025
All stages are conducted online via the following PMB Undip link:
[ https://pmb.undip.ac.id/sarjana/jalur-um-sarjana/ ]
Why Choose FIB Undip? A campus rooted in cultural and humanistic values Experienced and inspiring lecturers Opportunities for research, student exchange, and international projects Alumni thrive in diverse professional fields, from journalism to cultural diplomacy Make Your Dreams Come True with FIB Undip! Don’t wait for the opportunity to knock twice. Apply now and become part of the FIB Undip family a community of critical thinkers, creative minds, and empathetic learners.
FIB Undip – Excellence with Integrity!
